name: ClashRoyaleClans
description: This cog helps in maintaining clashroyale clans by storing their info obtained from official CR api. It acts as a base cog for other cogs such as recruitment, battlelog and more.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores in-game player stats: tags, name, clan, and scores.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the repository! Join our server for support: https://discord.gg/ZFW7g58
author: Generaleoley FyN8 GR8 Kingslayer VanHorn Nevus
